description:
Firo is a Camorra member that is an exceptionally skilled fighter. He is a good friend of the Gandors and Claire. Like a number of cast members, he becomes immortal in 1930, by drinking the liquor of immortality brewed by Barnes when the elixir is mistaken for a celebratory bottle of alcohol. Mistakenly sent to Alcatraz prison in 1934, along with Isaac.
He falls in love with Ennis, later "eating" Szilard to save her from death.
name: Firo Prochainezo
